name: Important Algorithms Every Programmer Should Know
description: Learn about crucial algorithms that are fundamental to computer science.

flashcards.question: What is the time complexity of Quick Sort?
What is the main idea behind Dynamic Programming?
flashcards.answer: Breaking down problems into smaller sub-problems

flashcards.question: What is the primary use of the FFT algorithm?
Which algorithm is often used in version control systems?
What does the Bellman-Ford algorithm do?
flashcards.answer: Finds shortest paths from a single source vertex

flashcards.question: What type of algorithm is the Knapsack problem?
